You asked, we listened. Discover ethical and sustainable BIPOC owned clothing brands from around the globe. Let's celebrate diversity in fashion and back the change we want to see in the world. https://t.co/pCBx7huVTK

For just the third time in U.S. history, a woman will be a major party’s #VP nominee. We won’t let the media’s sexist political attacks tear down @KamalaHarris or any other women candidates. Speak out & add your name to the #WeHaveHerBack open letter: https://t.co/cPWL46AJTv

Polish opposition members of parliament coordinated their outfits on Thursday to create a rainbow flag for President Andrzej Duda’s swearing-in ceremony.

https://t.co/LSfutZGdO1
Trans women pose no threat to cis women, but we pose a threat to them if we make them outcasts | Rebecca Solnit https://t.co/DFnjBs1xvr

"Prior to the Covid-19 outbreak, as far as disability and inclusion was concerned, the industry was very much broken. And now we’re in the midst of Covid, the industry is pretty much broken for everyone. Welcome to our world!” - @Adam_Pearson 

#PressReset https://t.co/xpDFnWzqNK
Meet some of those calling to #PressReset: @Adam_Pearson / @Lindsey_Dryden / @prouddavid / @ClarenceFrankie / @samrenke / @dan_edge
It’s time to #PressReset, it’s time to change how industry engages with disabled talent behind and in front of the camera #BFIIndustry https://t.co/4u4hje7STe

ALLFIE outraged as @GOVUK announces plan to create more special schools: “Our Government must stop shutting Disabled people out from mainstream education and put an end to inequality in education for Disabled people” @michedaley #ALLFIE #InclusiveEducation
https://t.co/WZ975x0pFR

Today, the #SistersNotStrangers coalition publish new research on how refugee women have survived during the pandemic. We spoke with 115 women across the UK. Women who were already vulnerable before the crisis have been made hungry and homeless.

https://t.co/mgwiPZszlA https://t.co/gvoWMcqzxY

We are SO excited to announce we are working with @renireni, Rebecca Solnit & @emmawatson to support their public history project to reimagine @TfL’s classic Tube map. #cityofwomenlondon will celebrate women who've made their mark on the city. Get involved https://t.co/Uc5l7OuUSm https://t.co/ZQpYecwaqj

I've been plotting alongside Rebecca Solnit, @emmawatson and @WOWisGlobal launch a public history project - reimagining @TfL’s Tube map by naming stops after women who've made their mark on the city. Would love to know who should rep your local station: https://t.co/Qy7w1Sv0Wh

Over the past 18 months, FRIDA staff have engaged in a deep reflection process on the technology we use & today, we published the results!  Click the link to see #FRIDAsTechPrinciples!

https://t.co/4DZmYXni6z

Art by the wonderful @el.boum (on instagram) #FeministTech https://t.co/mC3irBTkQd

The DEC is launching an urgent appeal to help people living in refugee camps and fragile states face coronavirus, which is likely to be even more deadly there than it was here. You can help families protect themselves. Donate now: https://t.co/tUK1N29Dip #DECappeal https://t.co/KTZsXWwAyx

We signed this statement with @EVAWuk @LAWALondon @IKWRO @lawrsuk & others demanding government: 

📢 Lifts the No Recourse to Public Funds condition that forces survivors to choose between abuse or destitution

📢 Finds a funding solution to sustain all
specialist VAWG services https://t.co/vTtFoFwoAi

We are facing the 'decriminalisation of rape', warns ⁦@VictimsComm⁩ in her first annual report - hope Government sits up & listens if someone so significant has to say something so shocking #RapeJusticeNow  https://t.co/KjuRRUzlo4
I did this interview in response to topping the UK book charts this week. https://t.co/QWr6eLhkBn

Black women artists doing it big and beautifully! https://t.co/10ZUOYoTtT

🚨PERSONAL ANNOUNCEMENT🚨

Im humbled to announce I am a recipient of the  Diana Award 2020 for my work on ending violence against women and girls with @_IntegrateUK 

I even got a special shout out from Prince Harry. I am so so grateful for such an incredible award @DianaAward. https://t.co/dr69fGIERs

At the current rate of progress, it will take up to 100 years before we reach gender equality at a global level.

Today, on our 10th birthday we are asking all of you to join us – together we can get there sooner. #GenerationEquality https://t.co/6PlRbuOrYh

Many patients seeking abortion in Louisiana can breath a sigh of relief. Your ability to access abortion shouldn’t be determined by where you live, how much money you make, and the color of your skin — and we’ll keep working to make that a reality for ALL people. https://t.co/HdSTnFbUsv
I wrote about ‘Three ways for UK schools to improve their race relations now’  https://t.co/d1Jq8tcGeF

We're live! Sorry for the delay, but we're now up and running at: https://t.co/Omv0UTNZBd. Join us  for our opening session and stay with us for a day and night of amazing talks and events #WOWGlobal24

Today, with @EVAWUK, we are launching a survey to explore the gendered online impact of Covid-19. Complete the survey now and share as widely as you can! https://t.co/f0RyPQeAW8 https://t.co/m7YlErGrSh

Today, we're launching our petition demanding that social media companies show that Black Lives Matter online too - by providing greater controls so that we can be warned about, and blur, violent images. Read our @galdemzine piece here: https://t.co/2UG3VJuADv https://t.co/U85jPtjf45

You can support our call to #TeachRaceMigrationEmpire and a *funded centre* for teacher training by writing to your MP and local school governors. 

We have letter templates for MPs/school governors here👇🏿

Please share 🙏🏿

https://t.co/90ulpQXbGz https://t.co/6cEYRb76Qw
https://t.co/gQoMDBfEAZ https://t.co/impCqCvusI
Happy #PRIDE2020 Sending love x
I donate to @Mermaids_Gender and @mamacash. If you can, perhaps you’ll feel inclined to do the same. ❤️
I want my trans followers to know that I and so many other people around the world see you, respect you and love you for who you are.
Trans people are who they say they are and deserve to live their lives without being constantly questioned or told they aren’t who they say they are.

@jk_rowling Hi everyone, just a quick note to say that if you'd like to donate to organisations that support black trans women – who are having an especially tough time at the moment, and facing hostility from every direction – @VICE has compiled a list. https://t.co/X5BeOPpYH9

"Statues aren't about remembering history. They are about memorialisation." @DavidOlusoga in our debate on statues in 2018 with @afuahirsch
